name: dragula
author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com>
description: Drag and drop so simple it hurts

scripts.scripts: pnpx browserify src/dragula.js --standalone dragula --debug --outfile dist/dragula.js && uglifyjs --mangle --compress --source-map url=dragula.min.js.map --output dist/dragula.min.js dist/dragula.js
scripts.start: pnpm run watch:example && pnpm run watch:dragula  && pnpm run generate:styles && pnpm run generate:styles:minify
scripts.build: pnpm run scripts && pnpm run generate:styles && pnpm run generate:styles:minify
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run deployment
scripts.deployment: git add dist && pnpm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && pnpm publish && git push
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:eslint; pnpm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:eslint -- --fix; pnpm run lint:prettier -- --write
